sentence.text: In humans, loss-of-function mutations of potassium ion import across plasma membrane, which encodes the inward-rectifying potassium channel KIR4.1, causes seizures and progressive neurological decline.

entity.text: potassium ion import across plasma membrane

sentence.text: Conditional knockout (cKO) of OL-potassium ion import across plasma membrane resulted in late onset mitochondrial damage and axonal degeneration.

entity.text: potassium ion import across plasma membrane
